plot: She's back, no one knows how, or when, but when she suddenly started terrorizing old friends, Batman is sent to check it out, and as he gets deeper and deeper in unraveling it all, he loses his loved ones in the process.
title: Batman Beyond Angel of Death
plot_es: She's back, no one knows how, or when, but when she suddenly started terrorizing old friends, Batman is sent to check it out, and as he gets deeper and deeper in unraveling it all, he loses his loved ones in the process.
plot_en: She's back, no one knows how, or when, but when she suddenly started terrorizing old friends, Batman is sent to check it out, and as he gets deeper and deeper in unraveling it all, he loses his loved ones in the process.
